snippet.title: Invisible, Inc. Launch Trailer (PC/Linux/Mac)
snippet.description:
Invisible, Inc. Available now on Steam (PC/Mac/Linux)
http://store.steampowered.com/app/243970
Take control of Invisible's agents in the field and infiltrate the world's most dangerous corporations. Stealth, precision, and teamwork are essential in high-stakes, high-profit missions, where every move may cost an agent their life.


MORE INFO:
Website: http://invisibleincgame.com
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/243970

SOCIAL:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/klei
Facebook: http://facebook.com/kleientertainment

Special thanks to MegaSteakman for help on this trailer.
http://youtube.com/megasteakman
